name: npd-app
description: This codebase is several projects wrapped into one, and the script to build them all together automatically is a work in progress.  Includes:

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:npdLegWidget" --restart-after 15000
scripts.dev:server: cd server && nodemon -i creds -i dist -i build index.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:main" "npm run build:widgets" && npm run build:copy:main
scripts.build:server: npm i --prefix ./server --dev && npm run build --prefix ./server && npm prune --prefix ./server --production --json
scripts.build:main: npm i --prefix ./main --dev && npm run build --prefix ./main && npm prune --prefix ./main --production --json
scripts.build:widgets: npm i --prefix ./widgets --dev && npm run build --prefix ./widgets && npm prune --prefix ./widgets --production --json

author: Will McVay
